summary: You'll find tonics, salves, poultices and potions on my shelves. Browse to your heart's content.
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=#999999]When i'm in Arcadia's Cauldron, trying to brew some potions, the only thing i keep think of is murder, because of her infinite speech loop.
This may actually help focusing on alchemy instead.Â [/color][/i][color=#cccccc]
[/color]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#6fa8dc][size=3][b][u]This mod (replacer) will:[/u][/b]
[/size][/color]Put a 30 seconds delay in front of arcadia's quotes: [i](or mute them on the whole)[/i]

[color=#999999][size=2][i]"You'll find tonics, salves, poultices and potions on my shelves. Browse to your heart's content."[/i]
[i]"If there's anything I can help you with, you have but to ask."[/i]
[i]"I offer remedies for ailments both common and rare. Do let me know if I can be of service."[/i]
[i]"I sell cures for all ills, and I'll be happy to serve you."[/i][/size][/color]

[u]If you play with "General Subtitles" ON, you will still see the text.
[/u][color=#999999][i](i play with dialog subs only, so i don't have that problem)[/i]
[/color]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][i][color=#fff2cc]log:[/color]
[/i][/b]1.1 - mute version:
fixed lipsync
author: egovir
